info.title: Devic.ai Public API
info.description:
# Devic.ai Public API Documentation

Welcome to the Devic.ai Public API! This RESTful API allows you to integrate with our AI agents and assistants platform.

## Authentication

**Note**: Authentication is handled by an external service. You'll need to include your API key in the request headers:

```
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
```

## Rate Limiting

API requests are rate limited to ensure fair usage:
- **Free tier**: 100 requests per minute
- **Pro tier**: 1000 requests per minute
- **Enterprise**: Custom limits

## Error Handling

The API uses conventional HTTP status codes:

- **200**: Success
- **400**: Bad Request - Invalid parameters
- **401**: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
- **403**: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions
- **404**: Not Found - Resource doesn't exist
- **429**: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded
- **500**: Internal Server Error

Error responses follow this format:
```json
{
  "error": "ERROR_CODE",
  "message": "Human readable error message",
  "details": {...} // Optional additional context
}
```

## Pagination

List endpoints use cursor-based pagination:

- **offset**: Number of items to skip (default: 0)
- **limit**: Maximum items to return (default: 10, max: 100)

## Versioning

The API is versioned using URL path versioning (e.g., `/api/v1/`). 
The current version is **v1**.

## Features

### ü§ñ Agents
- Create and manage AI agent execution threads
- Monitor thread status and results
- Handle approval workflows for human-in-the-loop scenarios
- Pause, resume, and complete threads

### üéØ Assistants
- Access custom and default assistant specializations
- Process messages with specific assistants
- Retrieve conversation history
- Manage chat sessions

## SDKs and Libraries

Official SDKs are available for:
- **JavaScript/TypeScript**: `npm install @devic/api-client`
- **Python**: `pip install devic-ai`
- **Go**: Coming soon
- **Ruby**: Coming soon

## Support

- üìß Email: support@devic.ai
- üí¨ Discord: [Join our community](https://discord.gg/suntropy)
- üìö Documentation: [docs.devic.ai](https://docs.devic.ai)
- üêõ Issues: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/suntropy/api/issues)

agentId.description: The agent ID to create a thread for

message.description: The input message to send to the agent (can be string or object)

state.description: Optional initial state for the thread

metadata.description: Optional metadata for the thread. Contains parameters for prompt templating in the agent system prompt and tool authentication.

propmptTemplateParams.description: Parameters used for template variable substitution in the agent system prompt (e.g., {{customerName}} becomes "John Doe")

tenantToken.description: Token used for authentication in tool calling operations

tenantId.description: Optional tenant ID for multi-tenant environments

enabledTools.description: Optional list of tools that are available to the agent from the configured tool groups. If defined but empty, no tools will be used.

tokenUsage.description: Enhanced token usage with cost breakdown

metadata.description: Thread metadata containing prompt template parameters and tenant token

propmptTemplateParams.description: Parameters used for template variable substitution in the agent system prompt (e.g., {{customerName}} becomes "John Doe")

tenantToken.description: Token used for authentication in tool calling operations

totalCost.description: Total cost in USD for the month

totalInputTokens.description: Total input tokens used in the month

totalOutputTokens.description: Total output tokens used in the month

totalInputCachedTokens.description: Total cached input tokens used in the month

totalOutputCachedTokens.description: Total cached output tokens used in the month

threadsCount.description: Number of threads executed in the month

post.summary: Create a new thread for an agent
post.description: Creates a new execution thread for the specified agent with the provided message.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The ID of the agent to notify

get.summary: Get threads for an agent
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of threads for the specified agent with optional filtering.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by tags (comma-separated list, returns threads matching ANY of the provided tags)

get.summary: Get a specific thread by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific thread.

patch.description: Updates the specified thread with the provided data.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to update

post.description: Processes an approval request for a thread that requires user confirmation.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: The ID of the thread requiring approval

post.description: Marks a thread as completed with the specified final state.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to complete

post.description: Pauses the execution of a running thread.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to pause

post.description: Resumes the execution of a paused thread.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to resume

post.description: Triggers evaluation of a completed thread based on multiple criteria.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to evaluate

400.description: Bad request - thread not found or not completed

get.summary: Get thread evaluation
get.description: Retrieves the evaluation results for a thread.

get.summary: Get all thread evaluations
get.description: Retrieves all evaluation results for a thread.

get.summary: Get specific thread evaluation by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific evaluation result by evaluation ID for a thread.

put.description: Update evaluation settings and custom criteria for an agent

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent

get.summary: Get agent evaluation configuration
get.description: Retrieve evaluation settings and custom criteria for an agent

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent

get.summary: Get daily costs for an agent
get.description: Retrieves daily cost breakdown for the specified agent within a date range.

get.summary: Get monthly costs for an agent
get.description: Retrieves monthly cost breakdown for the specified agent within a month range.

get.summary: Get cost summary for an agent
get.description: Retrieves cost summary for today and current month for the specified agent.

get.summary: Get unique tags from all agent threads
get.description: Retrieves a list of all unique tags used across agent threads for the authenticated client.

get.summary: Get unique tags from agent threads
get.description: Retrieves a list of all unique tags used in threads for the specified agent.

get.summary: Get all available assistant specializations
get.description: Retrieves a list of all available assistant specializations (both default and custom).

parameters.name: external
parameters.description: Include only assistants configured for external access

get.summary: Get a specific assistant specialization
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific assistant specialization by its identifier.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the assistant specialization

post.summary: Process a message with an assistant
post.description: Sends a message to the specified assistant specialization and returns the response. Optionally specify a custom LLM provider and model.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the assistant specialization

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input data, provider not configured, or model not supported

get.summary: Get chat history for a conversation
get.description: Retrieves the chat history for a specific conversation with an assistant.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the assistant specialization

parameters.name: chatUid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the chat conversation

get.summary: Get chat histories for an assistant
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of chat histories for the specified assistant.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the assistant specialization

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: omitContent
parameters.description: Exclude chat content from response (metadata only)

post.summary: Get all chat histories with filters
post.description: Retrieves a paginated list of chat histories across all assistants with optional filters. Send an empty JSON object {} if no filters are needed.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: omitContent
parameters.description: Exclude chat content from response (metadata only)

get.summary: Get unique tags from chat histories
get.description: Retrieves a list of all unique tags used across chat histories for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Health check endpoint
get.description: Returns the current health status of the API service.

get.summary: Get rendered markdown documentation page
get.description: Serves markdown documentation files as rendered HTML pages

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the markdown file (without .md extension)

get.summary: Get raw markdown documentation file
get.description: Serves raw markdown documentation files for download

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the markdown file (without .md extension)

text/markdown.example:
# Documentation

This is a markdown file...

get.summary: Documentation index page
get.description: Returns an HTML page listing all available documentation
